jain_gauri wrote:
> Hi all....
> 
> I m a new member of the grp and have recently started working on Junit.
> As on now i m able to run a simple test and suit. Now i need to
> generate a test report of the test that are being run. Currently i m
> getting a graphical report as i m using Eclipse. I know i need to make
> a xml file where i need to specify the dir and file for the report to
> be generated but exactly what is to done is still a mistry....Please
> help me on this its really urgent

The <junit> task in Ant can generate XML output suitable both for 
transformation with XSLT or other processing.

Take care.
--
